001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.alert;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.AbstractComponentService;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.factory.ComponentFactory;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.log.LogUi;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
008import org.openqa.selenium.By;
009
010/**
011 * Default implementation of {@link AlertService} that manages retrieval and interactions
012 * with various {@link Alert} implementations.
013 *
014 * <p>This class leverages a cache for created alert components, reducing overhead when
015 * performing repeated operations. Each method delegates to a retrieved or newly created
016 * {@link Alert} instance appropriate to the given {@link AlertComponentType}.
017 *
018 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
019 */
020public class AlertServiceImpl extends AbstractComponentService<AlertComponentType, Alert>
021      implements AlertService {
022
023   /**
024    * Constructs a new {@code AlertServiceImpl} with the given WebDriver.
025    *
026    * @param driver The {@link SmartWebDriver} used for UI interactions.
027    */
028   public AlertServiceImpl(SmartWebDriver driver) {
029      super(driver);
030   }
031
032   /**
033    * Creates a new {@link Alert} instance for the specified type by calling
034    * {@link ComponentFactory#getAlertComponent(AlertComponentType, SmartWebDriver)}.
035    *
036    * @param componentType The enum constant representing the alert type.
037    * @return A new or cached {@link Alert} instance for the given type.
038    */
039   @Override
040   protected Alert createComponent(final AlertComponentType componentType) {
041      return ComponentFactory.getAlertComponent(componentType, driver);
042   }
043
044   /**
045    * Retrieves the value of an alert using the specified component type and a container element.
046    *
047    * @param componentType The specific alert component type.
048    * @param container     The container element housing the alert.
049    * @return The text displayed by the alert.
050    */
051   @Override
052   public String getValue(final AlertComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
053      LogUi.step("Getting value from alert: " + componentType);
054      return alertComponent(componentType).getValue(container);
055   }
056
057   /**
058    * Retrieves the value of an alert using the specified component type and a locator.
059    *
060    * @param componentType    The specific alert component type.
061    * @param containerLocator A {@link By} locator identifying the alert element.
062    * @return The text displayed by the alert.
063    */
064   @Override
065   public String getValue(final AlertComponentType componentType, final By containerLocator) {
066      LogUi.step("Getting value from alert located by: " + containerLocator);
067      return alertComponent(componentType).getValue(containerLocator);
068   }
069
070   /**
071    * Checks if an alert is visible using the specified component type and a container element.
072    *
073    * @param componentType The specific alert component type.
074    * @param container     The container element housing the alert.
075    * @return {@code true} if the alert is visible, otherwise {@code false}.
076    */
077   @Override
078   public boolean isVisible(final AlertComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
079      LogUi.step("Checking if alert is visible: " + componentType);
080      return alertComponent(componentType).isVisible(container);
081   }
082
083   /**
084    * Checks if an alert is visible using the specified component type and a locator.
085    *
086    * @param componentType    The specific alert component type.
087    * @param containerLocator A {@link By} locator identifying the alert element.
088    * @return {@code true} if the alert is visible, otherwise {@code false}.
089    */
090   @Override
091   public boolean isVisible(final AlertComponentType componentType, final By containerLocator) {
092      LogUi.step("Checking if alert is visible at: " + containerLocator);
093      return alertComponent(componentType).isVisible(containerLocator);
094   }
095
096   /**
097    * Retrieves or creates (and caches) the {@link Alert} instance for the specified type.
098    *
099    * @param componentType The enum constant representing the alert type.
100    * @return The alert implementation associated with the given type.
101    */
102   private Alert alertComponent(final AlertComponentType componentType) {
103      return getOrCreateComponent(componentType);
104   }
105
106}
